Package webd4201.hinbestd

Class Faculty

java.lang.Object
webd4201.hinbestd.User
webd4201.hinbestd.Faculty
All Implemented Interfaces:
CollegeInterface
public class Faculty
extends User
This class inherits from User to create a new faculty member with the necessary information
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Faculty

      public Faculty​(long id, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, java.lang.String emailAddress, java.util.Date lastAccess, java.util.Date enrolDate, boolean enabled, char type, java.lang.String schoolCode, java.lang.String schoolDescription, java.lang.String office, int extension) throws InvalidUserDataException
      The parameterized constructor that creates a new Faculty member with the super-class parameter called to complete the inheritance of a user
      Parameters:
      schoolCode - the faculty's 3-4 character school code
      schoolDescription - the faculty's school name
      office - the faculty's office location
      extension - the faculty's phone extension
      id - the faculty's ID number
      password - the faculty's password
      firstName - the faculty's first name
      lastName - the faculty's last name
      emailAddress - the faculty's email address
      lastAccess - the faculty's last access date
      enrolDate - the faculty's enrollment date
      enabled - the faculty's enabled status
      type - the faculty's user type (Faculty)
      Throws:
      InvalidUserDataException

    • Faculty

      public Faculty() throws InvalidUserDataException
      Default constructor to create a new faculty member with the default faculty values and the default user values with the super class called
      Throws:
      InvalidUserDataException
